message: Let's be reasonable, I'm giving you a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, let's end this quickly. Take it or leave it.
You didn't take my first offer, now the deal is a bit worse for you.
Okay, let's be serious. This is my final offer above 50%.
Your 'final' offer wasn't good enough, now it's my turn again.
This is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Don't be greedy, Alice.
You should have taken one of my earlier offers, now I'm less willing to compromise.
Alice, let's be realistic. We're running out of time. This is a compromise - more for you, but enough to make it worth my while. Don't let's both walk away with nothing.
You're getting desperate, but I'm still not willing to give in. This is my best offer yet.
Alice, this is it. We both lose everything if we don't agree now.  This is your last chance to get a significant sum. Don't be foolish.
